about_the_game:
You’re a ball. You bust other balls. They drop stuff. You use that stuff to become better at busting balls.

That’s it. That’s the game.

The demo gives you a taste of the chaos, the upgrades, and the satisfaction of total ball domination. Try it now and see if you’ve got what it takes to be the ultimate Ballbuster.
detailed_description:
You’re a ball. You bust other balls. They drop stuff. You use that stuff to become better at busting balls.

That’s it. That’s the game.

The demo gives you a taste of the chaos, the upgrades, and the satisfaction of total ball domination. Try it now and see if you’ve got what it takes to be the ultimate Ballbuster.
name: Ballbuster Demo
short_description: Bust balls, collect the loot, upgrade your skills, and repeat. Ballbuster is a fast-paced action game where you’re a ball on a mission to dominate. Smash your way through waves of enemies, grow stronger with every hit, and prove you’re the best at breaking balls.
